_meanings:
{@--1@} ({%a%}) Connected with,
attached or related to; {#aho#} 
{#sarasaramaRIyAnubaMDinI strIjanakaTA#} <ls>Māl. 1</ls> 
having for its contents or subject
matter &c.; {#paricaryAnubaMDI#} <ls>Dk. 101</ls>
continuing. ({%b%}) Mixed or blended
with; {#nIlakaMWakalakekAnubaMDinA#} 
{#maMdrahuMkftena mAmanumanyate#} <ls>Māl. 9.</ls>

{@--3@} Lasting, thriving, 
prosperous, growing apace, continuous,
uninterrupted; {#api#} 
{#tvadAvarjitavArisaMBftaM pravAlamAsAmanubaMDi vIruDAM#} <ls>Ku. 5. 34</ls>; 

{#UrDvaM gataM yasya na cAnubaMDi#} <ls>R. 6. 77</ls> 
continuous, uninterrupted or 
all-pervading; <ls>K. 246</ls>, <ls n="K.">393.</ls>
